dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: We hope that you will like this app.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: It's a good idea to go through the Settings before doing anything. If there is anything wrong please file a bug using the link in the menu.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Please tap the lock to grant permission to read phone storage. If no files are being shown after that, use 'refresh' in the top right menu. (If the lock is not visible, the permission is already granted)

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: To interact with files you can either use the menu button next to each file entry or long press a file entry.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: New features in 2.0+ include: a dark theme, a notification when a new version is online in the PlayStore (only when you launch the app) and redesigned settings.
